articles.author: Laurie Sainsbury
articles.title: Top bets from Laurie Sainsbury for Flemington Saturday - Racenet
articles.description: We return to Flemington for Standish Handicap Day that is normally held on New Years Day. ELZAMEE (Race 4 No 5)One start for a win at Newcastle in mid December. That day he defeated Russian Ruble and Sandastan. Sandastan came out next start and won his maiden…
